idea:
FUDPRO is a digital marketplace for supply of home cooked Tiffin services. It’s a location-based App and one can order from anywhere and from any supplier of his choice with a flexibility of rescheduling his meals. It gives a chance to choose from a variety of suppliers on your finger tips.
Our Endeavor is to supply you home cooked food prepared by enterprising women. You can locate a Fudpro supplier with in 3 kms of your delivery location & your ordered food will be delivered to your location.
FUFPRO encourages a healthy competition among its suppliers to provide best of the taste and quality of the food. You can choose different suppliers for your lunch and dinner as per your location. So enjoy “घर से बाहर, घर सा खाना” with FUDPRO.  .http://www.fudpro.com/
name: FUDPRO

idea:
The REP(rental engineering product ) Is nothing but the renting the engineering products for eg:(if the company wants a drill machine,jcb crane,cutter,etc etcs for 2hours for something then they will contact the nearby retailer) Thus this platform will provide the portal for engineering products and the nearby retailer to connect between the customer and retailer .This it will also provide the price estimation for a hour and nearby retailer it will connect them .

Note:- not only for engineering for household and computer purposes also.
name: REP (Retail Engineering Products)

idea: Exportify "Exports Made Easy" We have soft launched our brand Exportify (www.exportify.in) with a motto of "Exports Made Easy". Basically, all what it takes to export any cargo under one roof!
